Desc.entry: A registered charity that provides hostel accommodation on a short-term basis for single women (i.e. do not have children living with them and are not pregnant) who are homeless, aged 16 years and over and who have housing support needs in addition. Can offer link-working sessions to support women to move on to independent or supported accommodation. Works in partnership with other agencies to support women with mental health, drug, alcohol and/or other issues. Part of Home Group Ltd, a Charitable Industrial and Provident Society.

category.entry: HOUSING, ADVICE AND SUPPORT FOR HOMELESS OR VULNERABLE PEOPLE
